alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 1:49PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Miami-Dade County through 215 PM EDT... At 149 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Country Walk, or near Kendall. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kendall, The Redland, Richmond West, Richmond Heights, Country Walk, Cutler Bay, West Kendall, Zoo Miami, The Crossings, Goulds, The Hammocks, West Perrine, Palmetto Bay, Princeton, Kendale Lakes, Inlikita, South Miami Heights, Howard, Palmetto Estates and Three Lakes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
